General.Name: Iz Hayvancilik Tarim ve Gida Sanayi Ticaret AS
General.Description: Iz Yatirim Holding A.S. produces and fattens milk in Turkey. It is also involved in the production of apple and sapling breeding. The company was formerly known as Iz Hayvancilik Tarim ve Gida Sanayi Ticaret A.S. and changed its name to Iz Yatirim Holding A.S. in April 2022. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
